name: Couple Jump
description:
Jump forever, will you be with your couple? All the progress you do can be easily ruined by each other if you don't do precise jumps.

In this game you will play as a couple, one for each hand. You can invite and try with someone else too.

CONTROLS are WASD for the sir - ARROWS for the lady.

Music by Dave Renda at https://youtu.be/hDLrim1ccuM
